thread.title: Nok Air Announces Delivery of two Q400 NextGen Aircraft
thread.title_full: Nok Air Announces Delivery of two Q400 NextGen Aircraft

author: Phuketindex
title: Nok Air Announces Delivery of two Q400 NextGen Aircraft
text:
Home » Travel & Food » Nok Air Announces Delivery of two Q400 NextGen Aircraft Nok Air Announces Delivery of two Q400 NextGen Aircraft   15, 2015 | 0 | Nok Latte and Nok Cappu 
Bangkok (Thailand), 15 October 2015 – Nok Air, Thailand’s premium low-cost airline announces its latest delivery of two Q400 NextGen aircraft from Bombardier’s facility in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. 
The airline continues to grow and enhances the service with the additional two Q400 NextGen turboprop aircraft, named ‘Nok Latte’ and ‘Nok Cappu’ which is a modern and fuel-efficient turboprop, capable of comfortably accommodating 86 passengers. The airline currently operates six Q400 NextGen aircraft after this delivery including Nok Anna, Nok Kao Pun, Nok Kao Poon, Nok Kao Neaw, Nok Latte and Nok Cappu. 
“Our 86-seat Q400 NextGen turboprops are fast, quiet and fuel-efficient aircraft that provide the perfect balance of passenger comfort. We specially install certified coffee machine on our Q400 NextGen aircraft to offer Nok Sky Café, premium coffee served onboard during the flight” stated Patee Sarasin, Nok Air’s CEO.
